https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ztpmkdBnXerpVnrUORjdnlglRAd.jpg When a bitter rivalry between two brothers finally erupts into bloody, life-changing violence it is younger bother Greg who signs up for frontline battle in France. Greg discovers a world of uncompromising brutality as we follow him on his journey through France at the outbreak of World War 2. Brothers of War
